title: BTS Has a Big Comeback Show and Movie on Netflix
summary: BTS is a famous K-Pop band that is coming back together after a break. They will have a live concert on Netflix on March 21 from a big square in Seoul, South Korea. This is to celebrate their new album called ARIRANG, which comes out on March 20. After the concert, Netflix will show a documentary movie about BTS on March 27, giving fans a special look behind the scenes. The band members had to do military service, which is a rule in South Korea, and now they are back. They will also go on a world tour to many cities, including London in July. Millions of fans, called ARMY, are excited to see them again.

What is the name of BTS's new album?
What will Netflix show after the concert?
Why did BTS take a break?

background_read: BTS is a South Korean boy band that started in 2013 and has become very popular worldwide. They make music in a style called K-Pop, which mixes singing, dancing, and catchy tunes. In South Korea, all able-bodied men must serve in the military for about two years, and BTS members did this from 2022 to 2023. After their break, they are reuniting to perform together again, which fans have been waiting for. Netflix is a company that lets people watch movies and shows online, and they are partnering with BTS to share their comeback with everyone.
Article_Structure: WHO: BTS, a K-Pop band, and their fans called ARMY
WHAT: A live concert and documentary on Netflix to celebrate their comeback and new album
WHERE: Gwanghwamun Square in Seoul, South Korea, and streaming worldwide on Netflix
WHY: To mark their return after military service and share their music with fans globally

perspectives.description: Fans are thrilled to see BTS back together and enjoy new music and shows.
